SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Application
Starts the GUI application with Application.run(Color, Consumer).
ApplicationContext
The application context renders graphics instructions (Graphics2D) to the drawing area of the application, waits or asks for a keyboard event or a pointer event.
Event
An event is either a pointer event or a keyboard event
EventModifier
An event modifier used by both KeyboardEvent and PointerEvent.
KeyboardEvent
A keyboard event.
KeyboardEvent.Action
Action of the event.
KeyboardEvent.Key
key of the keyboard
PointerEvent
A mouse event.
PointerEvent.Action
Action of the event.
PointerEvent.Location
Coordinates of the mouse pointer.
ScreenInfo
Screen size (width x height).
